title: Lake Pontchartrain
description: When Charity's father passes away, she moves from big city Shreveport, Louisiana to a small town called Laplace. It is here that she embarks on a new career as a private investigator. For her first assignment, she and her partner, Gus Timms-Copeland, are given the case surrounding Lake Pontchartrain. Will they solve the mystery in time? And will Charity finally find true love? Find out in Lake Pontchartrain.
author: L.L. Latta
